alert.note: Alert for Mobile (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 09 at 6:39PM CST until January 09 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Alabama, including the following county, Mobile. * WHEN...Until 945 PM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 638 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Midtown Mobile, Downtown Mobile, Prichard, Chickasaw, Semmes, I65 And I165, Mobile Regional Airport, Forest Hill, West Hill, Wheelerville, Tacon, Eight Mile, Orchard, Whistler, North Mobile, Mertz, Plateau, Navco and Neshota. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
